wordpressPost.title: More images from Øya 2011
wordpressPost.content: Spanish Guided By Voices enthusiast Héctor Cenador García visited Øya for the first time this year. He got to experience several other bands besides his favorite indie legends from Ohio, and reported that he had a really good time in Oslo. Héctor just sent us a selection of the photographs he snapped during the festival, of Guided By Voices (of course), but also Janelle Monáe and Wiz Khalifa.
